017package org.microbean.invoke;
018
019import java.util.Optional;
020
021import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
022
023import java.util.function.Supplier;
024
025/**
026 * A {@link Supplier} that computes the value it will return from its
027 * {@link #get()} method when that method is first invoked, and that returns
028 * that computed value for all subsequent invocations of that method.
029 *
030 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
031 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
032 *
033 * @param <T> The type of object returned by the {@link #get()}
034 * method
035 *
036 * @see #CachingSupplier(Object)
037 *
038 * @see #CachingSupplier(Supplier)
039 *
040 * @see #get()
041 *
042 * @see #set(Object)
043 */
044public final class CachingSupplier<T> implements Supplier<T> {
045
046
047  /*
048   * Instance fields.
049   */
050
051
052  private final Supplier<? extends T> delegate;
053
054  private final AtomicReference<Optional<T>> ref;
055
056
057  /*
058   * Constructors.
059   */
060
061  /**
062   * Creates a new {@link CachingSupplier}.
063   *
064   * @see #CachingSupplier(Supplier)
065   *
066   * @see #get()
067   *
068   * @see #set(Object)
069   *
070   * @see
071   * AtomicReference#updateAndGet(java.util.function.UnaryOperator)
072   */
073  public CachingSupplier() {
074    this((Supplier<? extends T>)null);
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Creates a new {@link CachingSupplier}.
079   *
080   * <p>An invocation of this constructor will result in the {@link
081   * #set(Object)} method always returning {@code false}.</p>
082   *
083   * @param value the value that will be returned by all invocations
084   * of the {@link #get()} method; may be {@code null} in which case
085   * the {@link #get()} method will return {@code null} forever
086   *
087   * @see #get()
088   */
089  public CachingSupplier(final T value) {
090    super();
091    final Optional<T> optional = Optional.ofNullable(value);
092    this.ref = new AtomicReference<>(optional);
093    this.delegate = () -> optional.orElse(null);
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Creates a new {@link CachingSupplier}.
098   *
099   * @param supplier the {@link Supplier} that will be used to supply
100   * the value that will be returned by all invocations of the {@link
101   * #get()} method; may be {@code null} in which case the {@link
102   * #get()} method will return {@code null} until, at least, the {@link
103   * #set(Object)} method is called; <strong>must be safe for concurrent
104   * use by multiple threads and must be side-effect free</strong>
105   *
106   * @see #get()
107   */
108  public CachingSupplier(final Supplier<? extends T> supplier) {
109    super();
110    this.ref = new AtomicReference<>();
111    this.delegate = supplier == null ? CachingSupplier::returnNull : supplier;
112  }
113
114
115  /*
116   * Instance methods.
117   */
118
119
120  /**
121   * Returns the value this {@link CachingSupplier} will forever
122   * supply, computing it if necessary with the first invocation by
123   * using the {@link Supplier} supplied at {@linkplain
124   * #CachingSupplier(Supplier) construction time}.
125   *
126   * <p>If the {@link Supplier} supplied at {@linkplain
127   * #CachingSupplier(Supplier) construction time} returns {@code
128   * null} from its {@link Supplier#get()} method, then this method
129   * will forever return {@code null} as well.</p>
130   *
131   * @return the value, which may very well be {@code null}
132   *
133   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
134   *
135   * @idempotency This method's idempotency and determinism are
136   * determined by the idempotency and determinisim of the {@link
137   * Supplier} supplied at {@linkplain #CachingSupplier(Supplier)
138   * construction time}.
139   *
140   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
141   * threads.
142   *
143   * @see #CachingSupplier(Object)
144   *
145   * @see #CachingSupplier(Supplier)
146   *
147   * @see #set(Object)
148   */
149  @Override // Supplier<T>
150  public final T get() {
151    Optional<T> optional = this.ref.get();
152    if (optional == null) {
153      optional = Optional.ofNullable(this.delegate.get());
154      if (!this.ref.compareAndSet(null, optional)) {
155        optional = this.ref.get();
156      }
157    }
158    return optional.orElse(null);
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * Sets the value that will be returned forever afterwards by the
163   * {@link #get()} method and returns {@code true} if and only if the
164   * value was previously unset.
165   *
166   * @param newValue the new value that will be returned by the {@link
167   * #get()} method forever afterwards; may be {@code null}
168   *
169   * @return {@code true} if and only if this assignment was permitted;
170   * {@code false} otherwise
171   *
172   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic.
173   *
174   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
175   * threads.
176   *
177   * @see #get()
178   *
179   * @see #CachingSupplier(Supplier)
180   *
181   * @see AtomicReference#compareAndSet(Object, Object)
182   */
183  public final boolean set(final T newValue) {
184    return this.ref.compareAndSet(null, Optional.ofNullable(newValue));
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
189   * {@link CachingSupplier}.
190   *
191   * <p>The format of the return value is deliberately unspecified and
192   * subject to change without notice from version to version of this
193   * class.</p>
194   *
195   * @return a {@link String} representation of this {@link
196   * CachingSupplier}
197   *
198   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
199   *
200   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic
201   * until a value has been supplied, either via the {@link
202   * #CachingSupplier(Object)} or {@link #CachingSupplier(Supplier)}
203   * constructors or the {@link #set(Object)} method.
204   *
205   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
206   * threads.
207   */
208  @Override // Object
209  public final String toString() {
210    return String.valueOf(this.get());
211  }
212
213
214  /*
215   * Static methods.
216   */
217
218
219  /**
220   * Returns {@code null} when invoked.
221   *
222   * <p>This method is referred to via a method reference in the
223   * {@link #CachingSupplier(Supplier)} constructor and is used for no
224   * other purpose.</p>
225   *
226   * @param <T> the type of object to return; irrelevant because
227   * {@code null} is always returned
228   *
229   * @return {@code null} always
230   *
231   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
232   *
233   * @nullability This method always returns {@code null}.
234   *
235   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
236   * threads.
237   *
238   * @see #CachingSupplier(Supplier)
239   */
240  private static final <T> T returnNull() {
241    return null;
242  }
243
244}
